tool.title: Creating Tools - Assignment #3
tool.about: This simple tool adds or subtracts two integers and produces an integer value.

about.label: Add this
about.description: First value (v1) in the "v1 + v2" computation performed by this tool.

about.label: To this
about.description: Second value (v2) in the "v1 + v2" computation performed by this tool.

about.label: Operation
about.description: Selects how the two numbers are combined to produce the result.

about.label: Result
about.description: Result of adding or subtracting the two input values.
